reviewText:
Preeti ( Raveena) is a rich girl & was in love with Raja( Sunny Deol)  in her college days. Gulshan Grover was the villan who used to ragg the young girls.
Her father was against marrige but they both marry by Shakti Kapoor interferance . oth are off to honeymoon But Raja is attacked by Villans .
SAif is a singer & marrys Preeti. but some man used to phone preeti . & then the climax.
